meanings.definition: Moyas (noun): A type of edible fruit.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe moyas from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh moyas every day.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed a sweet moyas after playing.
meanings.sent4: The moyas on the plate looked like colorful jewels.
meanings.sent5: The moyas had a juicy and refreshing taste.

meanings.definition: Moyas (verb): To gather or collect in a disorderly manner.
meanings.sent1: She moyas her toys all over the room.
meanings.sent2: The wind can moyas the leaves in the garden.
meanings.sent3: He tends to moyas his clothes on the chair.
meanings.sent4: The storm will moyas the papers on the desk.
meanings.sent5: Please do not moyas the items on the shelf.
